definition: fat/fertile/loose-fitting or large/to fertilize/to become rich by illegal means/fertilizer/manure
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

sentences.english: And what the land is， whether it be fat or lean， whether there be wood therein， or not.
sentences.chinese: 又看那地土是肥美是瘠薄，其中有樹木沒有。

sentences.english: Aser, his bread shall be fat, and he shall yield dainties to kings.
sentences.chinese: 阿協爾的食物肥美，將供給君王的佳餚。

sentences.english: The horse figure, Tang Dynasty. The horse body almost move at next second.
sentences.chinese: 唐朝的馬俑造型豐膩肥美，身形生動逼真動態十足。

sentences.english: The Great Green Wall stops the sand from moving to the rich land in the south.
sentences.chinese: 綠色長城阻止了風沙吹向北方肥美的田地。

sentences.english: Here the water was abundant and the grass luxuriant, which made the sheep grow fat.
sentences.chinese: 這兒水草肥美，讓它們長得肥滾滾的。

sentences.english: They found rich, good pasture, and the land was spacious, peaceful and quiet.
sentences.chinese: 尋得肥美的草場地，又寬闊又平靜。

sentences.english: My wellbeloved hath a vineyard in a very fruitful hill
sentences.chinese: 我所親愛的有葡萄園，在肥美的山岡上。

sentences.english: Out of Asher his bread shall be fat, and he shall yield royal dainties.
sentences.chinese: 他的食物必定肥美，他有美食可以供奉君王。

sentences.english: It’s renowned for excellent seafood and friendly people.
sentences.chinese: 她以肥美的海鮮和友好的人民聞名於世。

sentences.english: There is plump float grass. Let they grow plump.
sentences.chinese: 這兒水草肥美，讓他們長得肥滾滾的。

definition: meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130
